Attacks.Name: Frosty Foliage
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is given the Freeze special condition, reducing their movement by half during their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Icicle Wreath
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals piercing damage. After the attack is resolved, the target character and all characters within range 1 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Gift Barrage
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, distribute 1 power among allied characters within range 3 of Gifteon.

Superpowers.Name: Yuletide Cheer
Superpowers.Effect: At the start of each turn, Gifteon gives 1 power to an allied character within range 3.

Superpowers.Name: Evergreen Shield
Superpowers.Effect: Allied characters within range 2 of Gifteon add 1 die to their defense rolls until the start of Gifteon's next activation.

Attacks.Name: Blizzard of Giving
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Gifteon distributes up to 3 power among allied characters within range 3.

Superpowers.Name: Spirit of the Holidays
Superpowers.Effect: Remove all special conditions from Gifteon and gain 2 power. This superpower can be used only once per game.
